thread.title: TONYA B.
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by TONYA B.

author: TONYA B.
title: TONYA B.
text: On my very first visit to a Home Zone Store was great. I was immediately met at the door for assistance. All my questions was answered and I experienced a no hassle free shopping day. Sergio was excellent in his customer service. I will definitely shop her again. Thanks Sergio & the Home Zone Staff.
